biotools.summary: Computes measures of diversity and differenciation from haploid population genetic data, when a measure of the distance between haplotypes is available, and test whether the differentiation and diversity measures differ from the equivalent measures that do not take into account the distances between haplotypes.

bioschemas.name: PermutCpSSR
bioschemas.summary: Computes measures of diversity and differenciation from haploid population genetic data, when a measure of the distance between haplotypes is available, and test whether the differentiation and diversity measures differ from the equivalent measures that do not take into account the distances between haplotypes.
